titles.title: Congratulating and commending Free Comic Book Day as an enjoyable and creative approach to promoting literacy and celebrating a unique American art form.
Congratulating and commending Free Comic Book Day as an enjoyable and creative approach to promoting literacy and celebrating a unique American art form.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Congratulates Free Comic Book Day (the first Saturday of May) as an enjoyable and creative approach to promoting literacy and celebrating a unique American art form.
